summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Third Avenue West, from Aetna Street to West Etruria Street; West Dravus Street from Third Avenue West to a point two hundred sixty (260) feet west of Queen Anne Avenue; and Etruria Street and West Etruria Street, from Third Avenue West to a point one hundred eighty (180) feet west of Second Avenue North, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks, together with wooden curbs, gutters and crosswalks, in accordance with Resolution No. 518 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
